description: The Enablement Package (EKB) facilitates the upgrade from Windows 10 version 21H2 to version 22H2 and from Windows 11 version 22H2 to version 23H2. This package is essential for ensuring that systems are running the most up-to-date versions of Windows, which can enhance security, performance, and compatibility with applications. It acts similarly to previous enablement packages that converted Windows 10 versions, but specifically targets the newer environments of Windows 11. Administrators should ensure that the EKB is deployed on all eligible devices to maintain a consistent patch level across the organization. No specific links or additional documentation is provided in the post, so administrators may need to refer to Microsoft’s official channels for further guidance.
